english.segment1: I am nothing without You. Only a fly upon the wall. Listening in, hoping to find something about You. That will keep me from this fall
english.segment2: And sometimes I catch a glimpse. And my heart begins to beat. Day by day awaken me. You put the wind beneath my feet
english.segment3: I long for the water. That brings life to me. 'cause I long for the truth, oh. That sets man free
english.segment4: I am nothing without You. Only the dirt beneath Your nails. My heart is bruised and it's broken. And my soul is very frail
english.segment5: Please give me a reason. I need to name this man. And no longer this broken treason. Only on You I will stand
english.segment6: I long for the water. That brings life to me. 'cause I long for the truth, oh. That sets man free
english.segment7: Please mend these broken wings. And take the scales from my eyes. Without You I am nothing. I will not survive x2
english.segment8: I long for the water. That brings life to me. 'cause I long for the truth, oh. That sets man free
